module.name: qBTorrents
module.short: Unit containing a container for torrents.

descr.p: This unit contains a set of objects to suport the torrents data aquired from the API.

element.name: TqBTorrentState
element.short: Torrent States.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.qtsError
element.short: Some error occurred, applies to paused torrents.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.qtsPausedUp
element.short: Torrent is paused and has finished downloading.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.qtsPausedDl
element.short: Torrent is paused and has NOT finished downloading.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.qtsQueuedUp
element.short: Queuing is enabled and torrent is queued for upload.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.qtsQueuedDl
element.short: Queuing is enabled and torrent is queued for download.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.qtsUploading
element.short: Torrent is being seeded and data is being transfered.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.qtsStalledUp
element.short: Torrent is being seeded, but no connection were made.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.qtsStalledDl
element.short: Torrent is being downloaded, but no connection were made.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.qtsCheckingUp
element.short: Torrent has finished downloading and is being checked; this status also applies to preallocation (if enabled) and checking resume data on qBt startup.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.qtsCheckingDl
element.short: Same as checkingUP, but torrent has NOT finished downloading.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.qtsDownloading
element.short: Torrent is being downloaded and data is being transfered.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.qtsMetaDl
element.short: Torrent has just started downloading and is fetching metadata.

element.name: TqBTorrentState.qtsUnknown
element.short: Catch all state in case something changes in the API.

element.name: TqBTorrent
element.short: Container class for a single torrent.

element.name: TqBTorrent.Hash
element.short: Torrent hash.

element.name: TqBTorrent.Name
element.short: Torrent name.

element.name: TqBTorrent.Size
element.short: Total size (bytes) of files selected for download.

element.name: TqBTorrent.Progress
element.short: Torrent progress (percentage/100).

element.name: TqBTorrent.DlSpeed
element.short: Torrent download speed (bytes/s).

element.name: TqBTorrent.UpSpeed
element.short: Torrent upload speed (bytes/s).

element.name: TqBTorrent.Priority
element.short: Torrent priority. Returns -1 if queuing is disabled or torrent is in seed mode.

element.name: TqBTorrent.NumSeeds
element.short: Number of seeds connected to.

element.name: TqBTorrent.NumComplete
element.short: Number of seeds in the swarm.

element.name: TqBTorrent.NumLeechs
element.short: Number of leechers connected to.

element.name: TqBTorrent.NumIncomplete
element.short: Number of leechers in the swarm.

element.name: TqBTorrent.Ratio
element.short: Torrent share ratio. Max ratio value: 9999.

element.name: TqBTorrent.Eta
element.short: Torrent ETA (seconds).

element.name: TqBTorrent.State
element.short: Torrent state.

element.name: TqBTorrent.SeqDl
element.short: True if sequential download is enabled.

element.name: TqBTorrent.FirstLastPiecePrioritized
element.short: True if first last piece are prioritized.

element.name: TqBTorrent.Category
element.short: Category of the torrent.

element.name: TqBTorrent.SuperSeeding
element.short: True if super seeding is enabled.

element.name: TqBTorrent.ForceStart
element.short: True if force start is enabled for this torrent.

element.name: TqBTorrents
element.short: Container class for a list of TqBTorrent .

element.name: TqBTorrents.Items
element.short: Property to access the list of TqBTorrent by index.

element.name: TqBTorrents.Items.Index
element.short: Numerical index of the TqBTorrent.

element.name: TqBTorrents.Hashes
element.short: Property to access the list of TqBTorrent by hash.

element.name: TqBTorrents.Hashes.Hash
element.short: Hash of the TqBTorrent.

element.name: StrToqBState
element.short: Translates from String to TqBTorrentState .

element.name: StrToqBState.Result
element.short: The translated TqBTorrentState .

element.name: StrToqBState.aState
element.short: The String to be translated.

element.name: qBStateToStr
element.short: Translates from TqBTorrentState to String .

element.name: qBStateToStr.Result
element.short: The translated String .

element.name: qBStateToStr.aState
element.short: The TqBTorrentState to be translated.
